title: So-called Area A in Berenike
description: Ruins of a Hellenistic courtyard house (possibly connected to the adjacent building, known as Area X) in the archaeological site of Sidi Khiribech in Berenike (modern Benghazi).

properties.description: Representative OpenStreetMap location of the so-called "Area A", in the archaeological site of Sidi Khiribech, in Berenike (modern Benghazi).
properties.title: OSM location of Area A in Sidi Khiribech (Berenike)
